mean_cn: n.消息，信息，留言；  v.发消息
mean_en: a written or spoken piece of information, etc. that you send to somebody or leave for somebody when you cannot speak to them yourself
sentence: From the smile on his face, he must have gotten a message from a pretty girl!
sentence_trans: 从他脸上的笑容看，他一定收到了一个漂亮女孩的短信！
